name: deimosrising
text: A comment left by deimosrising was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by joeyramoney, ConnorMc, griggs_although)

name: catachresis
text: I don't like Pat not being a prick.

name: mortshire
text: he's like some one-dimensional beatnik right now.  not rad.

name: untilyouaresonude
text: It's still too early to clearly define any of them. Luckily, Pat makes up for lost time later (reading his blog actually pisses me off).

name: centipede_damascus
text: Synchronized dirty dude dancing!

name: redjoker
text: little known fact: choreographed synchronized dancing is your only hope of fending of squirrelfarts

name: abe
text: *sound of stylus being dragged off a spinning record*

name: jhunter
text: oh god i totally heard it

name: suprememongoose
text: I love the dancing. It is fierce.

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
i know, right ?

i'd love to see how this would get animated.

name: salad
text: this one is still top five

name: ghostd
text: What the hell, Todd? Always gotta ruin a party. Not cool.

name: fuckyoufriday
text: Dig Pat & Beef's military posture in panel 4.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Like a Motown group, or maybe a Wilson Pickett song. They are hard-core groovin'.

name: everything_is_a_hat
text: I love how serious they get when they go to dance.

name: dougthehead
text: That is indeed some furious dancing.

name: syrinx
text: Dancing is not an option with gas on the move.

name: xud
text: Beef looks so determined in panel 5

name: zefiel
text: Even this early you can tell that Dancing does not really making him happy.

name: xud
text: I bet marky mark and the funky bunch is playing.

name: snowman
text: c   c music factory

name: dtuba
text: Morris Day & the Time from Purple Rain

name: clembot
text: notice that todd continues to laugh into panel three

name: professoryes
text: It's just THAT funny.

name: qwerty
text: Most people would be ashamed if they did their britches within a social situation but not Todd. He is PROUD.

name: closefriend
text: When they're not laying it down on yo mama, the Dirtiest Dudes in town are a synchronized dancing troup akin to one of the gangs from West Side Story.

name: m3funkyb
text: Check it out. Pat is holding a wine cooler.

name: dovey
text:
Signs of sexual revelations to come?

PERHAPS

name: never_die
text: i imagine there was a record scratch between panels 5 and 6.

name: sharpdresseddan
text: hell of record scratching

name: tetrisattack
text: Roast Beef looks like he's going through hell trying to dance like Ray.

name: spectre
text: Alt text: "Has anyone seen Lyle? He claimed to want a lot to drink"

name: nutmeg
text: dang man todd is already abusing his brand new thong

name: zedpower
text: The dirtiest dudes in town even have a choreography going on. Do you have a choreography?

name: boswelljn
text: damn Todd for ruining what could have been!

name: closefriend
text: All right, I've given it a lot of thought. Here's the song they were dancing to: "Now That We Found Love" by Heavy D.

name: bjorntd
text:
What? Really?

I always figured it to be "Poison" by Bel Biv Devoe. :-/

name: heccibiggs
text: YES, that would be amazing.

name: onepapertiger
text: Oh my god. I knew how the beat would sound, although I did not know what song it should be. The beat sounded like this.

name: rowboat
text: I'm glad none of them sport webbed groins anymore, as in panel four. It's beyond unbecoming. It ain't natural.

name: stuart
text: Woah, yeah! What the whiskey straight?

name: semiquaver
text: Beef looks like a diff. man in panel 6. A diff. man with a diff. plan . A man who is too together to use full words.

name: coco
text: Ray and the Dirty Dudes require unwavering concentration.

name: atmus
text: The main reason I want an achewood cartoon is because when the DVD's eventually come out, there would hopefully be a full dance routine as an extra.  Everything else that could possibly be good with it is secondary to this one thing.

name: kamet
text: Synchronized Dirty Dude Dancing.  A thing of great beauty.  Another timeless strip.

name: overmedicated
text: Read while listening to 'Superstar' by Lupe Fiasco. Adds a touch of melancholy to the proceedings. God alone knows how.

name: farqussus
text: I would be sad to listen to that song.

name: biznart
text:
Dear Diary,

Today was the first time my vote made a difference. The Overall Rating moved!!! It moved because of me!!! I got so excited I threw up everywhere. Some even got on the mayor!

name: sharpdresseddan
text: Not the mayor!

name: sharpdresseddan
text: I gotta learn that dance

name: red-barchetta
text: Did...did Todd shit himself? I thought he just farted. Rude!

name: tekende
text:
The Dance Commander's ready to send
A radio message from his pew
